channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 31

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. I would definitely say that playing at least one game every other day would be great if i could manage it. Sometimes I feel like it's hard to even get in one or two games a week. Going to have to fix that somehow. Haha.
item.content:encoded: Haha. I would definitely say that playing at least one game every other day would be great if i could manage it. Sometimes I feel like it’s hard to even get in one or two games a week. Going to have to fix that somehow. Haha.

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: My problem is probably the opposite. I study just enough to get my go fix, then waist my time on other things. Leaving almost all those potential go games unplayed. I think i need to stop studying and just play the damn game. :)
item.content:encoded:
My problem is probably the opposite. I study just enough to get my go fix, then waist my time on other things. Leaving almost all those potential go games unplayed.
I think i need to stop studying and just play the damn game. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: It's certainly quite a bit to juggle. =D This week has been crazy though. It's been tough. Haha. But on the other hand, don't forget that I don't get to play as often. So I got to get my go fix somehow. =P
item.content:encoded: It’s certainly quite a bit to juggle. =D This week has been crazy though. It’s been tough. Haha. But on the other hand, don’t forget that I don’t get to play as often. So I got to get my go fix somehow. =P

item.title: By: Scott
item.dc:creator: Scott
item.description: You study so much. And read so many books. I don't think I could manage all that myself.
item.content:encoded:
You study so much. And read so many books.
I don’t think I could manage all that myself.
